channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More Evidence of Strength
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The S&P 500 has surged 38% since May 2021—before the 2022 bear market. But here’s the kicker: based on price-to-earnings ratios, it’s ...

item.title: I’m Seeing BIG Bets on Small-Cap Stocks
